text: Tamra sathe karagare dujana yubaka prabesa karala. Tadera ekajana balalah ami sbapne dekhalama ye, ami mada ninaracchi. Aparajana balalah ami dekhalama ye, nija mathaya ruti bahana karachi. Ta theke pakhi thukariye khacche. Amadera ke era byakhya baluna. Amara apanake satkarmasila dekhate pacchi.
